about_the_game:
We've all seen nice animated Outrun / s y n t h w a v e aesthetics on the internet. You know them—those with animated gradient suns in the background and grid mountains or cities with flashy towers. What if you could explore all of these environments in a retro game?

So what exactly is PalmRide: After Flight?

PalmRide: After Flight is an on-rails shooter heavily inspired by classic games and modern Outrun aesthetics. It's about flying, dodging obstacles, and shooting enemies while chilling in a retro, procedurally generated world. On your way, you will encounter enemies, obstacles, and, nonetheless, bosses. There are lots of surprises waiting for you, so prepare to take flight!

This game is the spiritual successor to PalmRide and features the same world from a new perspective.

The world!

This game is all about the atmosphere, from "Future Funk" cities to "Outrun/Synthwave" mountains, 80s retro beaches, mysterious deserts, or rainy mountains. PalmRide: After Flight has it all—everything you need for some nostalgic rides into the night.

Each place you'll visit has its own unique mechanics and visuals, so just drive and enjoy the ride!

Play together!

What retro game would this be without split-screen multiplayer? Like, fr, fr.

The game also features daily leaderboards so you can compete against other players. Reach the top of the leaderboard and be the RAD GUY!

What are your waiting for?

Just hop into your futuristic spaceship car and take flight into the night!
